r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: 1) Fixed typo, preventing to use set() with flags and expire in the same time (thanks to Troy Hakala [troy at recipezaar dot com] for noticing). 2) Added possibility to store objects and arrays compressed. 3) Hopefully fixed all possible problems with persistent connections (thanks to [anight at monamour dot ru]). 4) Some uncritical impovements.
